headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Nagasaki Shotaro
content: The future isn’t right around the corner. It’s already a mile down the road. It doesn’t matter that the Shotaro can make its way across uptown Vinewood faster than Hep B – with looks like these, you’d be eating, sleeping and screwing on it 24/7 anyway. Available to purchase once you’ve played a round of the new Adversary Mode, Deadline.
